svg.text: GGE Data Center - Electrical Single-Line Diagram
10kV MV Distribution | MTM Topology | 2N Backup Power
Phase 1 - 1.47 MW IT Load | Tier III | Tbilisi, Georgia
• Tier III compliant: 2N DRUPS, N+1 mechanical
• MTM topology at 400V with automatic tie breaker
• Dual utility sources: HPP (3.7 MW) + Grid (4.0 MW)
• 2N backup: DRUPS (diesel rotary UPS, MTU KP7)
• Failover: 52-TIE closes on utility loss (<1 sec)
• IT loads: Dual-corded with automatic failover
• PUE: 1.50 design (1.30 with river free cooling)
All breakers shown in normal operating state
